thread.section_title: Driver Support Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Driver Support | driversupport.com
thread.title: Marisa Grasser
thread.title_full: Driver Support reviewed by Marisa Grasser

author: Marisa Grasser
title: Marisa Grasser
text: i didnt want to pay to have my drivers updated but it wouldnt let me play games or download adobe flash player,so i went ahead n paid the 9.99..it was the best investment i could of made ..it is so worth the $..it took mayb 10 minutes to update 6 drivers n 1 missing driver...it also has the optimization on it to optimize ur pc..i recamend this to all who need to update there pc..its only 9.99 a month..well worth the $...
